name: CITY OF TIGARD OREGON
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to local transportation, economic development, water infrastructure and public safety projects. Support for an NEA Our Town grant.
Transportation funding levels, transportation enhancement and trails programs, projects of national significance and project streamlining.
